EiffelEnvision, New Projects, Blank Eiffel Graphical Application

paragraph.paragraph: The Blank Eiffel Graphical Application Wizard creates a new simple EiffelVision 2 ../../structure/index.xmlProject. The project will be added to an active or new Visual Studio .NET vxconVisualStudioSolutionsProjects 0 Solution .
The wizard is separated into two pages. Overview and System Settings. You may switch between the pages by clicking on the name of the page, located in the wizard's left pane.

The Overview page presents a basic overview of what is going to be generated for the project. The information detailed on this page reflects the information set of the System Settings page. If the defaults do not meet with your requirements, then please use the System Settings page to make the necessary changes.

The System Settings page allows you to modify the settings for the system created when the wizard is completed. The page allows you to modify features of the main window which will be launched by the application. The following settings may be modified:

Menu Bar
If selected, a default menu bar and menus will be generated with File and Help menus.

Tool Bar
If selected, a tool bar will be inserted into the main window of the application.

Status Bar
If selected, a status bar will be inserted into the main window of the application.

About Dialog Box
If selected, an about dialog box will be included in the project. If the menu bar option is also selected, then the dialog will be connected to the Help, About menu option.

Winform Container
If selected, a Windows Form container will be added to the main window permitting the use of Windows Forms controls inside your project.
Once you have set the appropriate settings for the new project, clicking Finish will create a new EiffelEnvision ../../../structure/index.xmlProject with the specified settings.
